object.name: addtofavorites
object.property: python: member and portal.portal_membership.getHomeFolder() is not None

object.name: change_state
object.property: python:portal.portal_membership.checkPermission("Modify portal content", object) or portal.portal_membership.checkPermission("Review portal content", object)

object.name: cut
object.property: python:portal.portal_membership.checkPermission('Delete objects', object.aq_inner.getParentNode()) and portal.portal_membership.checkPermission('Copy or Move', object) and object is not portal and not (object.restrictedTraverse('@@plone').isDefaultPageInFolder() and object.getParentNode() is portal)

object.name: copy
object.property: python: portal.portal_membership.checkPermission('Copy or Move', object) and object is not portal and not (object.restrictedTraverse('@@plone').isDefaultPageInFolder() and object.getParentNode() is portal) and (object.getId() not in ['data-and-maps','data','figures','explore-interactive-maps','data-providers-and-partners'])

object.name: paste
object.property: python:((object.restrictedTraverse('@@plone').isDefaultPageInFolder() or not object.restrictedTraverse('@@plone').isStructuralFolder()) and object.getParentNode().absolute_url() or object_url) + '/object_paste'

object.name: delete
object.property: python:portal.portal_membership.checkPermission('Delete objects', object.aq_inner.getParentNode()) and object is not portal and not (object.restrictedTraverse('@@plone').isDefaultPageInFolder() and object.getParentNode() is portal)

object.name: rename
object.property: python:portal.portal_membership.checkPermission('Delete object', object.aq_inner.getParentNode()) and portal.portal_membership.checkPermission('Copy or Move', object) and portal.portal_membership.checkPermission('Add portal content', object) and object is not portal and not (object.restrictedTraverse('@@plone').isDefaultPageInFolder() and object.getParentNode() is portal)

object.name: eeafigurefile_convert
object.property: Convert figure to predefined formats and resolutions

object.name: eeafigure_convert
object.property: Convert all figures to predefined formats and resolutions

object.name: copy_from_template
object.property: Copy common metadata from a template

object.name: promotion_add
object.property: Create a promotion for this item

object.name: promotion_remove
object.property: Remove all promotions for this item

object.name: promotion_translations
object.property: If translations of this item have been made after it was first promoted, this action promotes the new translations
